Atmosphere.description: Atmospheric conditions and gas composition during the experiment.

components.description: Gas components present in the atmosphere.

description.description: Detailed description of the atmospheric conditions.

totalOrganicCarbon.description: Total organic carbon content measurement in the atmosphere.

type.description: Type of atmospheric condition, such as inert (Ar saturated), ambient, UHV (ultra high vacuum).

url.description: URL with further details on the atmospheric setup or control system.

Atmosphere.title: Atmosphere

ChemicalIdentifiers.description: Standard chemical identifiers for unambiguous identification of compounds.

cas.description: CAS Registry Number (Chemical Abstracts Service identifier).

ChemicalIdentifiers.title: ChemicalIdentifiers

Component.description: A chemical component of the electrolyte solution.

chemicalIdentifiers.description: Standard chemical identifiers (CAS, SMILES, InChI, etc.) for unambiguous identification.

comment.description: Additional notes or observations about this component.

concentration.description: Concentration of the component in the electrolyte.

name.description: Name or identifier of the chemical component (trivial name, formula, or IUPAC name).

partialPressure.description: Partial pressure of a gaseous / volatile component.

proportion.description: Proportion of the component (e.g., volume percent, mole fraction).

purity.description: Purity level of the chemical component after the purification process.

source.description: Information about the supplier and supplied quality of the chemical.

type.description: Role or function of the component in the electrolyte.

Component.title: Component

ComponentSource.description: Information about the source and quality of the chemical component.

lot.description: LOT or batch number provided by the manufacturer or supplier for traceability.

manufacturer.description: Name of the company or organization that manufactured the chemical.

purity.description: Stated purity level from the supplier or manufacturer.

refinement.description: Any additional purification or treatment performed.

supplier.description: Name of the company that supplied the chemical.

ComponentSource.title: ComponentSource

ComponentType.description: Role or function of the component in the electrolyte.
ComponentType.title: ComponentType

Curation.description: Details on the curation process of the data.

process.description: List of people involved in creating, recording, or curating this data.

Curation.title: Curation

CurationRole.description: Role of a person in the data curation process.
CurationRole.title: CurationRole

DataDescription.description: Description of the raw data file format, including CSV dialect, field mapping from original headers to standardized names, and units for each field.

dialect.description: CSV dialect specification describing the format of the source data file.

fieldUnits.description: List of fields with their units and optional reference electrodes. Describes the physical units of each data column after mapping.

fieldMapping.description: Mapping from original column headers in the data file to standardized field names. Keys are the original headers (use ' / ' to join multi-line headers), values are the standardized names.

DataDescription.title: DataDescription

DataField.description: Description of a data field (column) compatible with frictionless table-schema and extended with echemdb-specific properties for physical quantities.

dimension.description: Physical dimension of the field (e.g., 'time', 'potential', 'current density').

format.description: Format specification for the field type (default, email, uri, binary, uuid for strings; default for numbers).

name.description: Name of the data field. Use single letters for specific systems. Otherwise use descriptive names like 't_rel', 'E_WE', or 'j_WE'.

orientation.description: Axis orientation in plots (horizontal for x-axis, vertical for y-axis).

reference.description: Reference electrode or reference point for this measurement (electrochemistry-specific).

title.description: A human-readable title for this field.

type.description: Data type of the field (string, number, integer, boolean, object, array, date, time, datetime, year, duration, geopoint, geojson, any).

unit.description: Unit of measurement for this field (SI or conventional electrochemical units), following astropy's string unit notation.

DataField.title: DataField

Dialect.description: CSV dialect specification describing the format of the source data file.

columnHeaderLines.description: Number of lines that make up the column headers. If more than one, header parts are joined with ' / '.

delimiters.description: Column delimiter character(s) used in the data file.

encoding.description: Character encoding of the data file.

headerLines.description: Number of header lines to skip before the column headers.

Dialect.title: Dialect

ElectrochemicalCell.description: Description of the electrochemical cell setup and configuration.

cellDescription.description: Detailed description of the cell configuration.

cleaningProcedure.description: Procedure used to clean the cell before experiments.

components.description: Physical components and parts of the cell that are in contact with the electrolyte.

source.description: Source and supplier information for the cell.

type.description: Type of electrochemical cell, such as H-cell, beaker glass, flow cell.

ElectrochemicalCell.title: ElectrochemicalCell

ElectrochemicalCellComponent.description: A component or part of the electrochemical cell.

name.description: Name or identifier of the component.

ElectrochemicalCellComponent.title: ElectrochemicalCellComponent

ElectrochemicalCellSource.description: Source information for the electrochemical cell.

url.description: URL to product page or technical documentation.

ElectrochemicalCellSource.title: ElectrochemicalCellSource

Electrode.description: An electrode used in the electrochemical cell, such as working, reference, counter, or collector electrode.

crystallographicOrientation.description: Miller indices of the surface orientation or 'poly' for polycrystalline. Always use spaces for value separation.

description.description: Detailed description of the electrode (especially for custom-made electrodes).

function.description: Role of the electrode in the electrochemical cell. Typical values: working electrode, counter electrode, reference electrode.

geometricElectrolyteContactArea.description: Geometric surface area of electrode in contact with electrolyte.

material.description: Chemical symbol or abbreviation of the electrode material.

name.description: Name or identifier for the electrode.

preparationProcedure.description: Procedures used to prepare the electrode before measurement.

purity.description: Purity specifications of the electrode material.

redoxSystem.description: Name of the reference electrode redox system (RHE, SCE, Ag/AgCl, etc.).

shape.description: Physical shape and dimensions of the electrode.

source.description: Source and supplier information for the electrode.

type.description: Type of electrode, such as single crystal, powder catalyst, metal sheet, or metal wire.

Electrode.title: Electrode

ElectrodeFunction.description: Role of the electrode in the electrochemical cell.
ElectrodeFunction.title: ElectrodeFunction

ElectrodePreparation.description: Procedures and methods used to prepare the electrode.

url.description: URL to detailed preparation protocol or procedure, such as an article DOI.

ElectrodePreparation.title: ElectrodePreparation

ElectrodeSource.description: Information about the source and supplier of the electrode.

purity.description: Purity specifications from the manufacturer or supplier.

url.description: URL to product specification or datasheet.

ElectrodeSource.title: ElectrodeSource

Electrolyte.description: The properties and components of the electrolyte solution.

comment.description: Additional notes or observations about the electrolyte.

components.description: Chemical components of the electrolyte including solvents, salts, acids, bases, and gases.

electrolyteContainer.description: Container used to prepare or store the electrolyte before the measurement.

ph.description: pH value of the electrolyte solution.

temperature.description: Temperature of the electrolyte during the experiment.

type.description: Type of electrolyte defined by the solvent.

Electrolyte.title: Electrolyte

ElectrolyteContainer.description: Container used to prepare or store the electrolyte before the measurement.

description.description: The vessel in which the supplying electrolyte was prepared or stored before the measurement.

ElectrolyteContainer.title: ElectrolyteContainer

ElectrolyteContainerComponent.description: A component of the electrolyte container.

type.description: The type of the container, i.e., a flask.

ElectrolyteContainerComponent.title: ElectrolyteContainerComponent

ElectrolyteType.description: Type of electrolyte defined by the solvent.
ElectrolyteType.title: ElectrolyteType

Experimental.description: Details about the configuration of the experimental setup.

description.description: Detailed description of the experimental setup and conditions.

instrumentation.description: Instruments and equipment used in the experiment.

tags.description: Keywords or tags describing the experiment, such as BCV, ORR, COOR, XPS, or MS.

url.description: URL to related documentation, publication (DOI), or ELN entry.

Experimental.title: Experimental

FieldUnit.description: Unit specification for a data field, following astropy's string unit notation.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the field and its physical meaning.

name.description: Standardized name of the data field (after mapping).

reference.description: Reference electrode or reference point for this field (electrochemistry-specific).

unit.description: Unit of measurement for this field, using astropy's string representation.

FieldUnit.title: FieldUnit

FigureDescription.description: Description of the data to a figure or plot including data type and measurement details.

comment.description: Additional notes about the figure or data.

fields.description: Description of data fields/columns in the figure.

measurementType.description: Acronym type for the measurement performed, such as CV, EIS, XPS, etc.

scanRate.description: The rate at which the data has been recorded.

simultaneousMeasurements.description: Other measurements performed simultaneously, such as ring current, IR, Raman, ICP-MS.

type.description: Source or origin of the data, such as digitized, raw, simulated, or processed.

FigureDescription.title: FigureDescription

FigureDescriptionType.description: Source or origin of the data.
FigureDescriptionType.title: FigureDescriptionType

Instrumentation.description: The instruments used to perform the experiment.

name.description: Name or identifier of the instrument.

Instrumentation.title: Instrumentation

Process.description: A person involved in the data curation process.

date.description: Date when the person performed their role (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD).

role.description: Role of the person in the data curation process.

Process.title: Process

Purity.description: Purity specifications of a chemical component.

container.description: Name or identifier of the container in which the chemical is stored.

refinement.description: Description of additional purification or treatment performed.

totalIonConductivity.description: Value for the total ionic conductivity measurement.

totalOrganicCarbon.description: Value for the total organic carbon content measurement.

url.description: URL with further details on the purity or container.

Purity.title: Purity

Quantity.description: A physical quantity with a value, unit, and optional uncertainty.

calculation.description: Method or formula used to calculate this quantity.

comment.description: Additional notes about the measurement or quantity.

uncertainty.description: Uncertainty information for a measured quantity.

unit.description: Unit of measurement as a string (e.g., 'mol / l', 'V', 'mA / cm2'). Can also be an integer (e.g., 1 for dimensionless).

value.description: Numerical value (can be a number, string, or null).

Quantity.title: Quantity

Shape.description: Physical dimensions and shape of the electrode.

description.description: Detailed description of the electrode shape.

diameter.description: Diameter of the electrode (for cylindrical shapes).

Shape.title: Shape

Source.description: Information about the source publication or dataset.

citationKey.description: Unique citation key for bibliographic reference, usually <FirstAuthorName>_<Year>_<FirstWordOfTitle>_<FirstPageNumber>.

curve.description: Specific curve or trace identifier within a figure.

figure.description: Figure number or identifier from the source including subfigure label.

originalFilename.description: Original filename of the data file.

techniques.description: Experimental techniques used in the study.

url.description: DOI (URL) to the publication or dataset.

Source.title: Source

SourceData.description: Metadata schema for source data files in echemdb, combining system description, curation, source provenance, experimental details, figure description, and data format description.

curation.description: Details on the curation process of the data.

dataDescription.description: Description of the raw data file format.

figureDescription.description: Description of the data to a figure or plot.

source.description: Information about the source publication or dataset.

SourceData.title: SourceData

System.description: Description of the experimental system including electrodes, electrolyte, and environmental conditions.

electrochemicalCell.description: Description of the electrochemical cell and its configuration.

electrodes.description: List of electrodes used in the electrochemical cell (working, reference, counter electrodes, ring electrodes).

electrolyte.description: The electrolyte solution used in the experiment.

System.title: System

Uncertainty.description: Uncertainty information for a measured quantity.

comment.description: Additional information about the uncertainty estimation.

Uncertainty.title: Uncertainty

description: Metadata schema for source data files in echemdb, combining system description, curation, source provenance, experimental details, figure description, and data format description.

curation.description: Details on the curation process of the data.

dataDescription.description: Description of the raw data file format.

figureDescription.description: Description of the data to a figure or plot.

source.description: Information about the source publication or dataset.

title: source_data
